channel.title: Rsps moba
channel.description: What would need to be done to create a RSPS MOBA style game? Can we recreate LoL with a RSPS? I assume it would be quite complicated and take a lot of time and people to finish it. Also, has it been attempted before, as far as anyone knows?

item.title: Rsps moba
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

hm…runescape moba…I could see it happening

boss fights to get drops, team pvp, gold to buy items
last hitting creatures as minions

but the genre doesnt exactly fit

Read full topic

item.title: Rsps moba
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“n10si t, post:9, topic:549361”]Would love to see Jagex make a runescape MOBA honestly. Could you imagine taking KBD and Commander Zilyana to go fight Tztok-Jad and General Graardor?[/quote]Would Graardor have his minions, or would he just be stuck with his two shitty abilities? An auto attack, and a range attack.

Read full topic

item.title: Rsps moba
item.dc:creator: @D3i7y D3i7y
item.description:
@D3i7y wrote:

i saw a project on r-s ages ago about rsps fps game that used a different camera angle. I could see this but the problem i see is why would you make a rsps moba when you could leave the legal issues behind you and use unity3d or the vast amount of free engines. I was on a team a few months ago using unity3d as our engine i am not a programmer but the devs we had loved unity3d. but thats just me.

Read full topic

item.title: Rsps moba
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

You couldn’t make it with the response time of lol without significant rewrites to the client but you could possibly make something similar in a sense sure. You will be putting a lot of time and effort in both the server and client regardless.
